62.ara-name: كتاب فضائل أصحاب النبى صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Qasim bin Muhammad:Once `Aisha became sick and Ibn `Abbas went to see her and said, "O mother of the believers! You are leaving for truthful fore-runners i.e. for Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) and Abu Bakr

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ عَائِشَةَ رضى الله عنها
chapter.eng-name: The superiority of 'Aishah رضي الله عنها
